info.author: Four Digits, maartenkling
info.description:
Introduction
============

Smart  Keyword Manager is  a Plone  product making  it easy  to manage
keywords ("tags") using smart folders.  On any smart folder, a new tab
will appear for Managers, allowing  them to do either batch edition of
keywords, or massive addition/removal  on all objects displayed by the
smart folder.

This product is based on SmartKwManager
http://plone.org/products/smart-keyword-manager


Dependencies
============

Tested on Plone 4.

Changelog
=========

0.6 (2011-01-04)
----------------

- Initial release
info.name: collective.smartkeywordmanager
info.summary: Used to apply tags to objects in a collection.
info.html_description:
Introduction

Smart Keyword Manager is a Plone product making it easy to manage keywords (“tags”) using smart folders. On any smart folder, a new tab will appear for Managers, allowing them to do either batch edition of keywords, or massive addition/removal on all objects displayed by the smart folder.

This product is based on SmartKwManager http://plone.org/products/smart-keyword-manager

Dependencies

Tested on Plone 4.

Changelog

0.6 (2011-01-04)

  • Initial release
